refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This element is a citation to a RefEntry. It must include a RefEntryTitle that should exactly match the title of a RefEntry.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: This element implicitly links to the RefEntry with the same RefEntryTitle (in the same volume, as defined by ManVolNum).
Usually the ManVolNum is put in parentheses.
